title: I have a concern with GGives’ partner collection agencies. What should I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Why am I not qualified for GGives?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39854938625561-Why-am-I-not-qualified-for-GGives)
- [I am encountering an error in applying for GGives. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39854502466841-I-am-encountering-an-error-in-applying-for-GGives-What-do-I-do)
- [I already paid my GGives but it’s not reflecting yet. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855043000857-I-already-paid-my-GGives-but-it-s-not-reflecting-yet-What-should-I-do)
- [I can’t make a payment for my GGives account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855188266649-I-can-t-make-a-payment-for-my-GGives-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times for one GGives payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855114305177-I-was-charged-multiple-times-for-one-GGives-payment-What-do-I-do)
- [I still haven’t received my GGives interest cashback after 14 days. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855101176729-I-still-haven-t-received-my-GGives-interest-cashback-after-14-days-What-should-I-do)
- [I was charged a penalty or additional fee even though I paid my GGives on time. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855251014681-I-was-charged-a-penalty-or-additional-fee-even-though-I-paid-my-GGives-on-time-What-do-I-do)
- [I have a concern with GGives’ partner collection agencies. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855320216985-I-have-a-concern-with-GGives-partner-collection-agencies-What-should-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

GGives’ [partner collection agencies](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4409087639065) are assigned to remind you of your unpaid GGives dues via calls, SMS, and email to help prevent more late payment fees.

If you have a negative experience with any of GGives’ partner collection agencies, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=ggives__i_want_to_file_a_complaint_against_collection_partners_or_collection_agent) A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I was charged multiple times for one GGives payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855114305177)
- [I can’t make a payment for my GGives account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855188266649)
- [I was charged a penalty or additional fee even though I paid my GGives on time. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855251014681)
